Common.tagline: One marketplace for Egypt’s local brands.

HomePage.heroTitle: The marketplace for Egypt’s local brands.
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Sellah turns DM chaos into a clean, secure checkout experience for buyers and sellers in Egypt.
HomePage.heroSecureAudience: For buyers & local brands in Egypt
HomePage.problemDescription: Screenshots, typing, and waiting for replies. No price clarity, no secure payment, and no proper order tracking.
HomePage.problemDmMessage1: Hi! Is this still available? And how much for size M?
HomePage.problemDmMessage2: Can you send me real photos? And what about delivery to Nasr City?
HomePage.problemDmMessage3: Ok I’ll send you the money on wallet then send screenshot?
HomePage.problemDmFooter: No prices · No protection · No tracking
HomePage.solutionDescription: The same local brands, but with clear prices, secure checkout, and one place to track everything for buyers and sellers.
HomePage.solutionPillSafeDescription: Money is captured safely through Sellah before the order is confirmed.
HomePage.solutionPillClearDescription: Size, color, and shipping fees are all visible before checkout.
HomePage.solutionPillTrackDescription: From placed to delivered, both sides see the same status.
HomePage.solutionPillDashboardDescription: Stores, products, and orders in one clean panel – no more screenshot chaos.
HomePage.buyersSectionTitle: A clean way to shop local brands.
HomePage.buyersSectionDescription: Browse curated Egyptian brands, see real prices and sizes, pay safely, and track everything from one place.
HomePage.buyersMetaSafe: Secure checkout across the full journey
HomePage.buyersStepDiscoverBody: A focused feed of Egyptian fashion, accessories, and lifestyle brands – no random noise.
HomePage.buyersStepClarityBody: Price, available sizes, colors, and shipping fees are visible before checkout.
HomePage.buyersStepSecurityBody: Pay through Sellah with confidence – not in random wallets or DMs.
HomePage.buyersStepTrackingBody: From confirmed to delivered, you always know where your order is.
HomePage.sellersSectionTitle: Turn DMs into a real store.
HomePage.sellersSectionDescription: Create a store, list products, and manage orders in minutes – with no subscription and commission only on successful sales.
HomePage.sellersPillStoreBody: Upload your logo, cover, and info once – Sellah handles the structure.
HomePage.sellersPillProductsBody: Photos, variants, stock, and pricing in one clean layout buyers understand.
HomePage.sellersPillOrdersBody: Clear order status, payment captured first, and less time chasing screenshots.
HomePage.sellersPillCommissionBody: No subscription or setup fee – you pay only when you actually sell.
HomePage.sellersFooterLine: Built for local brands, not marketplaces full of copies.
HomePage.trustTitle: Built to protect both buyers and sellers.
HomePage.trustDescription: Sellah puts structure around payments, reviews, and verification so local brands can scale without losing trust.
HomePage.trustMetricRatingBody: Ratings and reviews stay with each store across all their orders on Sellah.
HomePage.trustMetricVerifiedBody: Brands are reviewed and approved before going live – not just anyone with a DM.
HomePage.trustMetricProtectionBody: Payments are captured securely through Sellah before orders move to fulfillment.
HomePage.trustBadgeDisputes: Dispute-friendly: clear timelines for issues and returns
HomePage.trustBadgeSupport: Local support team focused on Egyptian buyers & brands
HomePage.howTitle: From app download to first order in a few steps.
HomePage.howDescription: Sellah is built for both sides. Switch between buyer and seller view to see how the flow feels for you.
HomePage.howBuyerStep1Title: Download the app & pick your role
HomePage.howBuyerStep1Body: Sign up in seconds with your mobile number and choose to browse as a buyer.
HomePage.howBuyerStep2Body: Save the stores you love and get a clean feed of only trusted Egyptian brands.
HomePage.howBuyerStep3Body: Pick size and color, then pay through Sellah’s secure checkout – not in DMs.
HomePage.howBuyerStep4Title: Track the order until it arrives
HomePage.howBuyerStep4Body: See order status updates in one place, from confirmed to delivered.
HomePage.howSellerStep1Body: Add your logo, cover, and business details – no design or coding needed.
HomePage.howSellerStep2Body: Upload photos, add variants and stock, and set clear pricing and delivery options.
HomePage.howSellerStep3Body: Get notified when an order is placed and paid, with all details organized.
HomePage.howSellerStep4Body: Fulfil orders, collect reviews, and use insights to grow your local brand.
HomePage.ctaTitle: Be first to sell or shop on Sellah.
HomePage.ctaDescription: Leave your email and we’ll invite you as soon as we open the doors to the next wave of Egyptian buyers and brands.
HomePage.ctaErrorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
HomePage.ctaErrorRole: Please choose whether you are a buyer or a seller.
HomePage.ctaSuccessMessage: Thanks – you’re on the list. We’ll email you as soon as Sellah opens up.
HomePage.downloadTitle: Scan once. Shop local on repeat.
HomePage.downloadDescription: Use your camera to open Sellah when it’s live, or save the QR in your photos and come back when you’re ready to buy or sell.
